SpireSide:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SpireSide:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SpireSide:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SpireSide:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SpireSide:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SpireSide:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SpireSide:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SpireSide:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SpireSide:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SpireSide:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SpireSide:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SpireSide:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SpireSide:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

SpireSide:ParryAndRiposte.NAME: Parry and Riposte
SpireSide:ParryAndRiposte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack NL gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.
SpireSide:ParryAndRiposte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack NL gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.

SpireSide:Duster.NAME: Duster
SpireSide:Duster.DESCRIPTION: Draw up to !M! Status Cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust 1 card.

SpireSide:Pinch.NAME: Pinch
SpireSide:Pinch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength.
SpireSide:Pinch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Permanent Strength.

SpireSide:Gambit.NAME: Demonic Gambit
SpireSide:Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Play the top 3 cards of your deck. Lose !M! Dexterity.

SpireSide:Shift.NAME: Shift
SpireSide:Shift.DESCRIPTION: Add a card from your discard pile then NL Discard !M! cards.
SpireSide:Shift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a card from your discard pile then NL Discard !M! card.

SpireSide:Pocket.NAME: Pocketed
SpireSide:Pocket.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Blur. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack NL Gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

SpireSide:Ferment.NAME: Fermenting Poison
SpireSide:Ferment.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Permanently Increase Poison applied by this card by 2. NL Exhaust.

SpireSide:Refuse.NAME: Choking Gas Bomb
SpireSide:Refuse.DESCRIPTION: If this card is discarded from your hand, NL Apply !M! Choked to All Enemies.

SpireSide:Versatility.NAME: Versatile Strike
SpireSide:Versatility.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL This card's effect depends on your class.

SpireSide:Viscous.NAME: Viscous Poison
SpireSide:Viscous.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

SpireSide:CallDown.NAME: Call Down
SpireSide:CallDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-on to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

SpireSide:StrikeThis.NAME: Strike This!
SpireSide:StrikeThis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X Times. Gain 1 Additional Block for ALL your cards containing "Strike".
SpireSide:StrikeThis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X+1 Times. Gain 1 Additional Block for ALL your cards containing "Strike".
